Enchantment 4

Vile Water
Ritual

spell id [id]: 900

damage [damage]: 2159

gems required [gemcost]: 2W
Summon Units:#2159 Gelatinous Cube
The alchemist creates a bath of water and vitriol. The vitriolic water is given form and purpose through powerful alchemical rituals. The alchemical entity is known as a Gelatinous Cube. It slowly slides forward and swallows anything it passes over. Swallowed beings quickly dissolve in the vitriol, unless the cube is destroyed and its magic unraveled.
